import sys
sys.path.append('../input/xlrd-python') #required for autoviz
from autoviz.AutoViz_Class import AutoViz_Class

AV = AutoViz_Class();
source.abef1c0b:
filename = "../input/tabular-playground-series-mar-2021/train.csv"
sep = ","
dft = AV.AutoViz(
    filename,
    sep=",",
    depVar="target",
    dfte=None,
    header=0,
    verbose=1,
    lowess=False,
    chart_format="svg",
    max_rows_analyzed=300000,
    max_cols_analyzed=32,
)
source.af85853a:
filename = "../input/tabular-playground-series-mar-2021/test.csv"
sep = ","
dft = AV.AutoViz(
    filename,
    sep=",",
    depVar="", # No dependant variable
    dfte=None,
    header=0,
    verbose=1,
    lowess=False,
    chart_format="svg",
    max_rows_analyzed=300000,
    max_cols_analyzed=32,
)
source.52087014: Visualize Training Data
source.402d3129:
Automatically Visualize any dataset, any size with a single line of code.

AutoViz performs automatic visualization of any dataset with one line. Give any input file (CSV, txt or json) and AutoViz will visualize it.
